General.Name: Sung Gang Asset Management Ltd
General.Description: Sung Gang Corp.Limited engages in the purchase and sale of electronic components and computer peripherals in Taiwan. It is also involved in leasing and parking lot operation; book publishing; and financial debt acquisition business. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.50, Zhongxiao West Road, Taipei, Taiwan
